tool.name: Show-Diff

param.name: amos
param.label: Output diff information as AMOS features

param.name: info
param.label: Show diff information for queries or references

tool.help: This program classifies alignment breakpoints for the quantification of macroscopic differences between two genomes. It takes a standard, unfiltered delta file as input, determines the best mapping between the two sequence sets, and reports on the breaks in that mapping.
